Question: AONdevices, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AONDevices, Inc.

AON1120™ Chip

- Sensor fusion chip for super low-power Edge AI
- Reliable voice command recognition
- Enhanced sound and contextual awareness
- Biometric, gesture, and motion recognition
- Compact 40QFN packaging
- Dual NPU, RISC-V core, and specialized HW DSP processing units
- 16x GPIOs for diverse application integration
- Super-Low Power: <260μW at 100% processing
- Listening Mode: <80μW for optimizing battery life
- High Accuracy with >90% detection rate at <0dB SNR
- Over 40 output classifications for various AI tasks
- Applications include health monitoring, smart home automation, and accessibility aids
